author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower pan tips…I cut the 3/4 inch perimeters off the pan before customizing the size. I add those perimeters followed by the pan and ensure they’re level. This makes the shower wall tile installation easier for custom pans. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial. For more Schluter shower tips, check out our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#schluter #showerremodel #bathroomrenovation #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Shower Pan Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
